title: Show Business Hours as Always Open and Improve Logo Visibility

requirements.text: Update the Contact section Business Hours UI to display a single status of “Always Open” instead of the current day-by-day schedule.

quotes: Please add Business hours always open

acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact section, the Business Hours card no longer shows Monday–Sunday rows.
The Business Hours card shows the text “Always Open” as the only hours/status line.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Make the site logo clearly visible in both the header and footer by adjusting its presentation (e.g., sizing and/or adding a contrasting background, padding, and/or subtle shadow) while keeping the same logo asset path.

quotes: Make sure logo is not clear visible so make it perfect visible

acceptanceCriteria: The logo remains loaded from /assets/generated/patil-logo.dim_512x512.png in both header and footer.
In both header and footer, the logo has sufficient contrast against the surrounding background (light and dark themes) and is visually clear (not washed out or blending into the background).
Logo maintains aspect ratio and is not distorted.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components); compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx and Internet Identity hooks).
Backend remains single-actor; no backend changes are required for these UI-only updates.
nonGoals: Adding a backend-powered contact form submission or storing contact messages.
Changing the logo file itself or generating a new logo image (unless explicitly requested later).
Adding new sections/pages beyond updating Business Hours text and logo visibility.
